availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky farmer. Greenup County, Kentucky native. Married Margaret Valence. Father of Rebecca Valence and Jacob C. Valence. Married Elizabeth Perry Valence in 1859.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 227. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 7. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 1, p. 18. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Greenup County, 1859, Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. “Samuel Vallance, Jr (1822-1902),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 19403934, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19403934&ref=acom (accessed June 15, 2017).
